name: Hearts of Palm Salad
author: HEATHER SG
summary: This salad is very easy to make and always requested by my family.  People think they are eating something special because it is made with hearts of palm. Best if chilled overnight.
ingredients: 3 (14.25 ounce) cans hearts of palm, drained and sliced
2 (.7 ounce) packages dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
½ cup white wine or champagne vinegar
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the dressing mix, vinegar, and water until well blended
Add hearts of palm to the bowl, and stir to coat
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour or overnight
Before serving, sprinkle the green and black olives, and bacon bits over the salad
